title: A discourse of things above reason· Inquiring whether a philosopher should admit there are any such. By a Fellow of the Royal Society· To which are annexed by the publisher (for the affinity of the subjects) some advices about judging of things said to transcend reason. Written by a Fellow of the same Society.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by E.T. and R.H. for Jonathan Robinson at the Golden Lion in S. Paul's Church-Yard,
